org.qscript.events

Class ScriptEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.qscript.events.ScriptEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvaluationErrorEvent, HaltExecutionEvent, OutputEvent, ResumeEvent, ScriptFinishedEvent, StoreUpdateEvent, SyntaxErrorEvent, TraceEvent, WaitEvent

    public abstract class ScriptEvent
extends EventObject
    Base class for all scripting events
    Author:
    Peter Lager
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScriptEvent

        public ScriptEvent(Script script,
           ErrorType etype,
           int lineNo,
           int pos,
           int width,
           Object[] extra)
        The basis for all script events
        Parameters:
        script - the source of the event
        etype - the error type (if event caused by error)
        lineNo - line number where the event was fired
        pos - the position in the source code where the token starts
        width - the width (chars) of the token
        extra - this extra object is specific to this event

      • ScriptEvent

        public ScriptEvent(Script script,
           ErrorType etype,
           int lineNo,
           int pos,
           int width)
        The basis for all script events
        Parameters:
        script - the source of the event
        etype - the error type (if event caused by error)
        lineNo - line number where the event was fired
        pos - the position in the source code where the token starts
        width - the width (chars) of the token

      • getSource

        public Script getSource()
        Get the source of this event i.e. the script. Does the same as getScript()
